metadata.creator: Microsoft
metadata.description:
These are theÂ  wallpapers included in Windows 95 Plus!

I'm uploading these since search engines have been SEO'd to death with junk - it's impossible to find the original wallpapers. Even if you can find them, they've been modified/botched/4K'd/remixed or violated in some way.

You also have to go digging through .CAB files to extract these so hopefully this upload makes it easier to nab these backgrounds directly.

I've categorised the upload as "image" rather than "software". Bit of a grey area.

The wallpapers are from the themes:
Dangerous Creatures
Inside Your Computer
Leonardo da Vinci
Mystery
Nature
Science
The 60's USA
The Golden Era
Sports
Travel
Windows 95
More Windows

metadata.title: WIndows 95 Plus! Wallpapers
